entities.name: Lavender
entities.description: A student in the class who is being addressed by Moody.

entities.name: Moody
entities.description: A wizard with a magical eye who is teaching the class.

entities.name: Parvati
entities.description: A student in the class who is being shown something by Lavender.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: A student in the class who raises his hand to answer Moody's question.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: A student in the class who raises her hand to answer Moody's question.

entities.name: Miss Brown
entities.description: The teacher of the class who is being addressed by Moody.

relationships.description: Moody's magical eye can see through solid wood, as well as out of the back of his head.
Moody is watching Parvati while he talks to Lavender.
Ron is answering Moody's question about curses.
Hermione is also answering Moody's question about curses.
